text: Antônio Josenildo Rodrigues de Oliveira (born 10 October 1997), known as just Rodrigues, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a defender for the club Grêmio. ==Professional career== Rodrigues began playing football with the youth academy of ABC in 2013, then Cruzeiro in 2015 before returning to ABC again in 2017. He began playing under the name Tonhão, before switching to Rodrigues to honour his adoptive mother. Rodrigues made his professional debut with ABC in a 2-0 Campeonato Brasileiro Série B loss to Vila Nova on 26 August 2017. On 9 August 2019, Rodrigues signed a professional contract with Grêmio after a brief loan with them. ==Honours== ABC *Campeonato Potiguar: 2017, 2018 Grêmio *Campeonato Gaúcho: 2019 ==References== ==External links== * * Grêmio Profile Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rio Grande do Norte Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Grêmio Foot-Ball Porto Alegrense players Category:ABC Futebol Clube players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players
title: Rodrigues (footballer)
